name: Garlicky Bacon-Wrapped Chicken Bites
author: Paleo Flourish
summary: These bacon-wrapped chicken bites are amazing as an appetizer or snack.
ingredients: 1 large skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized chunks
8  thin slices bacon, cut into thirds
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Place garlic powder in a bowl
Dip each chicken piece into the garlic powder
Wrap each piece of bacon around a chicken bite
Arrange on the baking sheet so they're not touching
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon turns crispy, 25 to 30 minutes
